Actually the game works fine. To install follow these steps. After you create the iso icon and you mount it on your virtual drive, go to ''my computer'', right click on the virual drive named ''pt_boats'' and choose ''exlore''. Then double click on the ''autorun'' file and you are ready to go. Be careful not to click the ''PTsetup'' file becouse the instalatio crashes.
